source: TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_TALK_A2<tab>What items are suited for aetherial reduction?
TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_000<tab>Like I said before, it's a method o' reducin' certain items to their base aetherial components. Crystals, mostly, but occasionally other rare materials.
target:
TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_000「収集品」としての価値があるほど希少性の高い素材を、
マテリア精製の技術を応用して、結晶化する技術……
それが「精選」だ！

source: TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_001<tab>Not just any items, mind─collectables. Ain't easy to get yer hands on such rarities as it is, so ye'd best refer to yer logs to make sure yer lookin' in the right place.
target:
TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_001「精選」の素材にできる「収集品」は、
どこにでも転がってるようなシロモンじゃねえ。
採集手帳や魚類図鑑を活用して、アチコチ探してみな！

source: TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_010<tab>Well...if it ain't a collectable, ye can't reduce it, so there's that.
target:
TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_010ここが、大事なところだが……
「収集価値」のないものは「精選」ができねえんだ。
「精選」をするには、「収集品」を用意する必要がある。

source: TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_011<tab>Also, while any ol' collectable can be reduced, ye'll get far better yields from ones with especially high collectability. 'Course, that means you'll have to part ways with it, but I needn't remind you of the obvious, eh?
target:
TEXT_REGWILREDUCE_00276_KOKOSAMU_000_011それと、「収集価値」が高い稀少な素材ほど、
貴重な品が「精選」しやすくなるんだぜ。
